text.tspan: … but so is the quality of their local environment
Unit 20 'Capstone: Economics of the environment’ Section 20.10 'Policy choices matter' in The CORE Team, The Economy.
GDP per capita in 2014 (PPP, constant 2011 international dollars)
Source: Jaiteh et al. (2014), Maddison Project Database (2018)
Note: The index rises with better quality of the local environment. Environmental Performance Indices are displayed on the 'MAP' tab.
